publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3145.1 Sarah Boyack: Legislation for Increased Penalties for Wildlife Crime-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3145) in the name of Nora Radcliffe, leave out from "(a)" to end and insert and insert "progress legislation on wildlife crime through amendments to the Criminal Justice (Scotland) Bill, and welcomes the recent commitment by the First Minister to introduce a draft Bill on nature conservation in this parliamentary session in respect of the remaining proposals in The Nature of Scotland."
S1M-3145.1 Legislation for Increased Penalties for Wildlife Crime (lodged on 21 June 2002) Rhona Brankin*

S1M-3145.1 Legislation for Increased Penalties for Wildlife Crime (lodged on 21 June 2002) Jackie Baillie*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Margaret Jamieson*, Bristow Muldoon*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Scott Barrie*
S1M-3145.1 Legislation for Increased Penalties for Wildlife Crime (lodged on 21 June 2002) Dr Sylvia Jackson*
S1M-3145.1 Legislation for Increased Penalties for Wildlife Crime (lodged on 21 June 2002) Angus MacKay*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S1M-3145.1 Legislation for Increased Penalties for Wildlife Crime (lodged on 21 June 2002) Marilyn Livingstone*
